name: Theft Item Report
query:
select
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.for_theft_incident as "Theft Incident:Link/Theft Incident",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.site as "Site:Data/Site",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.theft_report_date as "Theft Report Date:Data/Theft Report Date",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.isurance_claim_status as "Insurance Claim Status:Select/Insurance Claim Status",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.item_lost as "Item Lost:Data/Item Lost",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.quantity as "Quantity:Data/Quantity",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.product_insured as "Product Insured:Select/Product Insured",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.insurance_company as "Insurance Company:Data/Insurance Company",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.insured_name as "Insured Name:Date/Insured Name",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.date_of_insurance as "Date of Insurance:Data/Date of Insurance",
    `tabInsurance Claim Status`.policy_number as "Policy Number:Data/Policy Number"
from `tabInsurance Claim Status`;
